RelatedSentence: HEBRON , May19 , 2014 , ( WAFA ) - Israeli forces Monday arrested four Palestinians , including two teenagers , from the West Bank cities of Hebron and Bethlehem , as well as summoned another for interrogation , according to security sources .
Sources said that forces arrested two Palestinians from the Hebron area .
